name: Pops Blast 2048: Balls Crush
description:
The colorful balls are pouring towards you like a waterfall!
Combining a classic 2048 puzzle game with the pops crush twist, our game,Pops Blast: Balls Crush 2048! will give you the smooth game experience of merging the colorful balls!

You just need to tap the same number of balls while playing Pops Blast: Balls Crush 2048! Lots of colorful pops are rushing to you while you are merging them to the biggest 2048!

How to play:
- Tap the same color of balls in the container close to each other
- The same color balls can be merge and blast violently
- Make great combos and the balls will keep falling!
- Mergr the same number balls to reach the highest 2048!

Highlights:
- Simple and smooth play
- No time limit,and you can play it anywhere or anytime
- Relaxing and addictive
- Classic 2048 puzzle game
- Rich tools

Now go to the world of pops to enjoy the crazy feeling of ball blast!
